meanings.sent1: The jarls were respected leaders in ancient Scandinavia.
meanings.sent2: The jarls held important positions in society during that time.
meanings.sent3: The jarls decided to have a friendly competition to see who could grow the longest beard.
meanings.sent4: In the land of imagination, the jarls were giants who walked among men.
meanings.sent5: The jarls wore majestic cloaks adorned with symbols of their power.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of jarls walking through the village.
meanings.sent2: The jarls gathered to discuss matters of great importance.
meanings.sent3: The jarls' horses all had matching golden horseshoes.
meanings.sent4: The jarls stood tall like ancient trees in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The jarls' voices echoed through the halls, commanding attention.
